snippet: Victims' families and first responders were given an advance showing of the memorial exhibition that is planned for the National September 11 Memorial and Museum Foundation.
abstract: Victims' families and first responders were given an advance showing of the memorial exhibition that is planned for the National September 11 Memorial and Museum Foundation.

headline.main: Families, Responders Get View of Exhibition Planned for 9/11 Museum
headline.print_headline: Families Take a First Look at September 11 Museum
